name: test_e2e_with_logs[029_SQLI_BOOL_015]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_015` |
| **Name** | ASCII function test |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' OR ASCII('A')=65 --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20OR%20ASCII('A')%3D65%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~22000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:42:14.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_015-1767433334427-2e25ot pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_015 uri=/?q='%20OR%20ASCII('A')%3D65%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:42:14.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_015-1767433334427-2e25ot pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_015 uri=/?q='%20OR%20ASCII('A')%3D65%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
